tooltip.About: Pt. Bhargava, was a deeply committed member of Ganga Mandali, a group devoted to spiritual discipline. Every single day of the year, without fail, he would rise early at 5 AM and take a holy dip in the Ganga. His dedication was a beacon for the family, and by the time he returned, everyone in the household knew they had to be ready for the Ramayan Path, a practice that instilled a sense of discipline and devotion in every member of family.

Smt. Raj Rani Bhargava was a religious housewife who found joy in the company of her large, loving family, filled with children and grandchildren. Married at a young age, she embraced a life rich with love and laughter. She particularly enjoyed playing cards with Babaji and other family members, making cherished memories together.

CS Bhargava, who retired from SBI, was a man of great humility and respect, both at work and within his family. Starting his career as a clerk, his hard work and dedication saw him rise to a senior level by the time he retired. He was not only a mentor to many but also a valued member of various social organisations. As the eldest brother and a father figure to the entire family, his maturity, kindness, and unwavering commitment were deeply respected. Though he never raised his voice, his dissapproval would shake people's core, reflecting his calm yet commanding presence. His humorous anecdotes were a source of learning for his children, making him a guiding force in their lives.

Santosh was a devoted housewife, known for her kindness, gentle nature, and a heart so big it encompassed ages and continents, often defying reason. Simple and loved by all, she embraced life with warmth and grace. After marrying into the family, she learned to play cards, quickly earning everyone's affection with her newfound skill. She had a passion for travel, exploring new places with her husband, and was an enthusiastic cook who also enjoyed indulging in chole from outside vendors. Never one to complain, Santosh was deeply loved by her parents and in-laws. As the eldest daughter-in-law, she took care of her much younger brothers-in-law just like a mother, adding a comforting presence to her family. She also had a special fondness for tea.

RS Bhargava was a man of great humility and warmth, known for his friendly nature and easygoing personality. He had a deep passion for sports, fitness, swimming, and gardening, often dedicating hours to these activities. His commitment to health was evident in his routine of waking up at 4 AM for his morning walk and exercise. He encouraged others to live freely and pursue their dreams, always offering practical advice for any challenge. After a fulfilling career in the Irrigation Department of Madhya Pradesh, he left behind a legacy of fitness, wisdom, kindness, and a love for nature.

tooltip.place: Earlier Rewa, MP and now Bhopal, MP
tooltip.About: Badi Sudha (as fondly called in family) is a warm and caring individual, always ready to help others in any situation. Her accommodating nature and love for meeting people make her a cherished presence in any gathering. She is a treasure trove of knowledge, from home remedies to rituals, and never forgets a special occasion. An expert in home-cooked sweets, she adds a touch of sweetness to every celebration. Her creativity shines through in the sweaters and crochet items she has lovingly made for so many. Her deep devotion is especially evident during Krishna Janmashtami, a celebration close to her heart.

Shibu Ji is a passionaite engineer specializing in Structural Engg. projects, and his passion for the field remains strong even in his later stages of retirement. He continues to engage in various engineering projects and has a rich background as a former lecturer in a polytechnic. Committed to social service, he has significantly impacted the lives of underprivileged children in rural areas of UP. Revered as the most loved and admired member of the family, he is recognized for his unwavering discipline and punctuality, traits that earned him deep respect and admiration from everyone, young and old . His deep love for family was poignantly demonstrated by his selfless act of donating a kidney to his brother. Shibu Ji is also known for his diverse talents, excelling in sports, drawing, sketching, and singing, which further enrich his vibrant personality.

Sudha was a remarkable individual and a true fighter, having bravely survived cancer three times. Her heart was full of love for everyone around her, and she always enjoyed cooking for her family. A multi-talented person, she had a passion for creativity that would have likely led her to become a dress designer if she were alive today. Always striving to do her best for her family, she was candid in her communication, providing constructive feedback when it could help others. Her caring nature made her a cherished presence in the lives of those who knew her.

tooltip.job: (Retd.) A.E. Jal Nigam -> C.E.O. Alps Engineers
tooltip.About: Lav Ji exhibited a high level of risk-taking behavior in his approach to life. He engaged in a diverse range of pursuits, including astrology, engineering, music (Harmonium), sketching and reading.He had profound and deep-rooted feelings of affection and attachment towards family. He loved kids a lot and use to be very happy seeing them excel in life. He was very strong person and despite major health issue early in life, he stepped up and rocked like no one.

Veena was a woman of great passion, especially when it came to cooking and gardening. She carefully maintained a diary filled with bhajans and recipes, and her culinary creations, like dhokla and Mysore pak, are still fondly remembered by many. Known for her exceptional resilience and determination, Veena had a warm and welcoming nature, always treating guests in her home with affection and care.

Avadhesh Ji, affectionately dubbed 'Jham Saheb' by his friends during his early working days, is a retired SBI professional with a friendly demeanor that has earned him countless friendships. His welcoming nature makes it easy for people to connect with him, and he values maintaining those friendships over time. Always ready to lend a helping hand, AKB believes in supporting others by checking in to see if they need assistance. He enjoys traveling to new places and is an excellent cook, known for creating unique dishes with fresh ingredients that never fail to impress. AKB also enjoys playing Teen Patti and Marriage in card games and has a sweet tooth for desserts. He enjoys sharing an occasional whiskey with loved ones, which adds to his charm as a companion.

Sushma is a remarkably simple and down-to-earth individual who embraces a basic lifestyle, finding joy in the everyday. She has always shown deep respect for elders and is widely regarded as an exceptional cook, often celebrated as the best in the family. With her ability to whip up fast and delicious meals, she would frequently impress unexpected guests with a sumptuous last-minute feast, earning appreciation from her father-in-law. A firm believer in truth, she is dedicated to caring for her children. Sushma is a religious and god-fearing woman with a remarkable memory, recalling many cherished moments from her life. During her younger years, she enjoyed playing badminton and carrom, and still always look forward to a family game of Teen Patti

Ashok Ji is a vibrant personality known for his singing talent, his skill in whipping up the best meals, and his unmatched prowess in card games. He consistently impresses people with his positive attitude and commitment to a healthy lifestyle. As the heart of the family, he brings fun and warmth to every gathering. He has a delightful and humorous way of telling stories, captivating his audience for extended periods. Though he may have moments of impatience, his light-hearted spirit and warm personality always shine through. Ashok Ji takes great care in nurturing his relationships, and his heartwarming nature makes him a friend to everyone who knows him.

Renu was a remarkable woman whose cooking skills had a unique way of bringing everyone together. Her deep faith was central to her life, and she always offered quiet but unwavering support and love to her family. Renu was like a coconut—firm and disciplined on the outside, yet incredibly gentle at heart. She was a strong woman who never gave up, no matter the situation, and her strength was as much a part of her as her culinary talent.
